name: An Eon Later
description:
The crew wake up after hibernated for a thousand-year and found themselves on this perfect planet that humans can live on. They want to share this great idea with Earth but noticed the connection does not work because of a lack of fuel. They start to explore and search for fuel on this planet and hope that this planet can be humans' new home and solve the problem humans were facing...

Hint:

You need to rest enough time to unlock more items in game.

The horse will help you cost less sanity in scout.

The boat will help you pass through the water.

Attention:

please don't click the next turn button too fast... might cause bugs....

Cheat Button just in case:

you can press I to skip current turn(only use if you get stuck in the game please~~)

Game reference:

Sarusaru DS
